title: Stereo Wide-Angle Cameras for ExoMars Grant - Part 3 (Filter Selection)
abstractText: This proposal is for a twelve month grant to allow work on the ExoMars PanCam wide angle stereo cameras to proceed through the instrument preliminary design review in October 2008 (see PPRP Proposal ref.: PP/E007120/1). This grant follows on from the first & second 6 month bridging grant (STFC Ref.: PP/F00107X/1 & ST/F008678/1). This particular Co-I proposal relates to selection of PanCam filters so that these may be optimised for geological and astrobiological applications.
